Episodes.Title: Biology 101
Episodes.Plot: The Greendale study group reunites. Jeff butts heads with the new biology teacher and Dean Pelton finds a new nemesis in the dean of the Air Conditioning Repair Annex.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Geography of Global Conflict
Episodes.Plot: Chang gets used to his new job. Britta reacts to a friend being taken hostage in a foreign country. Annie asks the group to help bring down her new friend. Professor Cligoris struggles to behave appropriately.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Competitive Ecology
Episodes.Plot: When the gang accepts a new person into the group, they learn how delicate their friendships really are.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Remedial Chaos Theory
Episodes.Plot: New roommates Troy and Abed host an apartment-warming party that takes a strange turn.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Horror Fiction in Seven Spooky Steps
Episodes.Plot: The gang tells scary stories while Britta discovers that one of her pals might be a psychopathic maniac.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Advanced Gay
Episodes.Plot: Pierce is excited about a party he's throwing to celebrate his business success, but the affair becomes very different when his elderly father arrives.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: John Goodman, Larry Cedar, Jerry Minor, Shangela

Episodes.Title: Studies in Modern Movement
Episodes.Plot: The study group pitches in to help when Annie decides to move in with Troy and Abed, but the plan breaks down when she becomes frustrated by their fun-loving lifestyle. Elsewhere, Dean Pelton discovers Jeff at the mall and blackmails him into spending a lovely afternoon together.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Documentary Filmmaking: Redux
Episodes.Plot: When the school board asks Dean Pelton to make a new commercial for the school, he enlists the study group to star in his production. Meanwhile, Abed films all the activities for a documentary.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Luis Guzman,  Richard Erdman,  Charley Koontz

Episodes.Title: Foosball and Nocturnal Vigilantism
Episodes.Plot: Jeff and Shirley bond over foosball. After Annie breaks Abed's special edition DVD of "The Dark Knight", she covers it up by staging a robbery.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Nick Kroll,  Richard Erdman,  Craig Cackowski,  David Ury

Episodes.Title: Regional Holiday Music
Episodes.Plot: When the Greendale Glee Club is unexpectedly sidelined, the school's effervescent choir director Cory Radison sets about recruiting the study group members to fill in. Skeptical at first, they eventually fall under his hypnotic spell, singing and dancing their way to the annual Christmas Pageant.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Urban Matrimony and the Sandwich Arts
Episodes.Plot: Andre proposes that he and Shirley remarry and a wedding date is set. Britta and Annie get busy planning the wedding and Jeff prepares to give a wedding speech, while Troy and Abed get ready to be "normal" for the occasion. Meanwhile, Pierce and Shirley pitch a sandwich shop idea to Dean Pelton for the Greendale cafeteria.

Episodes.Title: Contemporary Impressionists
Episodes.Plot: Jeff begins experiencing extreme narcissism. The group helps Abed get rid of debt by impersonating various celebrities at a Bar Mitzvah.

Episodes.Title: Digital Exploration of Interior Design (1)
Episodes.Plot: As the new Greendale Subway shop opens in the cafeteria, Shirley, Pierce and Britta plot to bring about its early demise. Vice Dean Laybourne makes another attempt to get Troy to join the Air Conditioning Repair Annex, while Abed and Troy find themselves at odds over their competing pillow and blanket forts.

Episodes.Title: Pillows and Blankets (2)
Episodes.Plot: The war between Abed and Troy intensifies, prompting Jeff to try to negotiate a truce between the former best friends while the rest of the group choose sides.

Episodes.Title: Origins of Vampire Mythology
Episodes.Plot: Annie, Troy and Abed try to help Britta avoid an old flame who has returned to town, while Jeff and Shirley set out to catch a glimpse of the mystery man. Elsewhere, Laybourne turns to Dean Pelton for help with his pursuit of Troy.

Episodes.Title: Virtual Systems Analysis
Episodes.Plot: When a final exam is postponed, Annie talks Abed into letting her spend some time in the dreamatorium, where an innocent simulation turns into an examination of the study group.

Episodes.Title: Basic Lupine Urology
Episodes.Plot: In a homage to Law & Order, the study group investigate a crime when someone sabotages their science experiment. When they discover the perp, Annie plans on prosecuting them to the fullest extent of Greendale's Code of Conduct.

Episodes.Title: Course Listing Unavailable
Episodes.Plot: When a beloved classmate dies unexpectedly, Britta uses skills from psychology class to counsel the study group. Chang tries to seize more control over campus security.

Episodes.Title: Curriculum Unavailable
Episodes.Plot: Abed becomes convinced that there is a conspiracy afoot and that Dean Pelton is an imposter. When Abed is apprehended sneaking around on campus, he is required to see a therapist, or risk being sent to jail.

Episodes.Title: Digital Estate Planning
Episodes.Plot: Pierce is summoned to Hawthorne Enterprises to discuss his inheritance with his deceased father's former right-hand man, Gilbert Lawson. The study group goes with him for moral support and must all pitch in to play the video game of their life on Pierce's behalf for the sake of his inheritance.

Episodes.Title: The First Chang Dynasty
Episodes.Plot: When Chang gains control of Greendale's campus, the study group forms a plot to take back the school. Troy seeks help at the Air Conditioning Repair Annex.

Episodes.Title: Introduction to Finality
Episodes.Plot: Jeff and and his former colleague Alan battle in court as opposing counsel in Pierce and Shirley's sandwich shop case. Meanwhile, Vice Dean Laybourne makes one last ditch effort to win Troy over to his Air Conditioning Repair Annex.
